availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nancy Annis Ladd Stewart (Trigg County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to William Stewart in Trigg County, Kentucky, on December 18, 1843. Mother of Mary E. Stewart, William H. Stewart, Jemima Stewart, John J. Stewart, Lucy J. Stewart, Thomas M. Stewart, Benjamin F. Stewart, and George J. Stewart. Resident of Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Trigg County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District 1, p. 307B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, p. 89.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994056, Trigg County Births, p. 7.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trigg County Marriages, Film 000321335.
